appetizers.name: Awesome Blossom
appetizers.description: A beautiful onion, cut and fried to perfection, and served with our signature smokey sauce.  You haven't had fried onion rings until you've had an Awesome Blossom

appetizers.name: bag of crisps
appetizers.description: Your choice of a bag of chips

hot sandwiches.name: BLT
hot sandwiches.description: Crisp apple wood smoked bacon, fresh crunchy lettuce, juicy tomatoes, enveloped in home-baked fresh sourdough bread, lightly toasted to perfection

hot sandwiches.name: grilled cheese
hot sandwiches.description: your choice of mozzerella or cheddar (or both!) cheese grilled on sourdough bread until the cheese is ooey gooey.  Served with mustard and a dill spears on the side

cold sandwiches.name: Italian sub
cold sandwiches.description: juicy smoked black forest ham, zesty genoa salami, and spicy pepperoni set the stage for this classic sub, with provalone aged to perfection

cold sandwiches.name: turkey avocado
cold sandwiches.description: local turkey meat with creamy avocado served on home-baked sourdough. comes with a side of dill pickle spears and apple slices

desserts.name: spumoni
desserts.description: in-house gelato with the trio of cherry, chocolate, and pistachio flavors

desserts.name: Eiskafee
desserts.description: This German treat will top you off with a kick. Rich dark coffee poured over sweet vanilla bean ice cream, and topped off with a dollop of whipped cream

drinks.name: Traveler's Water
drinks.description: Why just have bottled water with plastic waste, when you can grab one of our traveler's canteens with your choice from 6 groovy designs?! Every time you come in with it, you can top off from our water carafe, and enjoy a 10% discount on your order!

drinks.name: Lemonade
drinks.description: This lemonade will take you back to sweet summer evening memories.  Made with fresh-squeezed lemons
